CustomField.description: Whether or not Stripe should automatically decline charges with an incorrect zip/postal code. This setting only applies if a card includes a zip code and the bank specifically marks it as failed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Whether or not Stripe should automatically decline charges with an incorrect zip/postal code. This setting only applies if a card includes a zip code and the bank specifically marks it as failed.
CustomField.label: Decline Charge On AVS Failure
